message.content: {"id": "15899", "title": "Bug 15899: Close all saved does not work all the time", "description": "", "OB": "When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, if Close All Saved is selected from the file menu after creating a new file f1.txt, nothing happens.", "EB": "The Close All Saved option should close the f1.txt file, as no changes have been made.", "SR": "Ensure that the Close All Saved option in the file menu closes the file even if no changes have been made."}
